school: Faculty of Allied Medical Sciences and Healthcare Skills (FAMSHS)
overview:
Professor, Dean & Registrar (Additional Charge) - Allied Medical Sciences at DSEU Dwarka Campus (formerly known as Integrated Institute of Technology, Dwarka)
MBA – Strategic Management and Entrepreneurship, School of Business and Technology, Washington DC, USA
Post Doctorate- Biological and Medicinal Chemistry, University of Massachusetts, Boston, USA
PhD- Biomedical Science, CSIR-IGIB and University of Delhi, Delhi
MS- Bioinformatics, University of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK
MSc- Biomedical Science, ACBR, University of Delhi, Delhi
BSc (Hons)- Chemistry, KMC, University of Delhi, Delhi.


Professor Gagan Dhawan did his graduation and post-graduation from University of Delhi, India. He was the recipient of the CSIR-Catch Them Young Award twice during his post-graduation in Biomedical Science under HRD for Biomedical Research: CSIR-University Interaction Model. He joined Ranbaxy Research Laboratories (Preclinical Pharmacokinetics and Metabolism Division) as a Research Chemist. After a few months, his interest in teaching attracted him to join the Department of Biomedical Science, Acharya Narendra Dev College, University of Delhi in August 2000. He did his doctorate from CSIR-Institute of Genomics and Integrative Biology, Delhi.

He was awarded Universitas 21 Fellowship to pursue Master’s in Bioinformatics from the University of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK. He was also invited as Visiting Faculty (August, 2011) at Laboratoire de Chimie des Polymères Organiques (LCPO), University of Bordeaux, France. He also visited Structural Biology Group, University of Edinburgh, UK (June, 2012) and Bradley Research Group, School of Chemistry, University of Edinburgh, UK (June, 2013) as Visiting Scientist.

Further, he is recipient of the prestigious UGC-Raman Award to pursue Post-Doctoral Research at 67dbb6508ca4a5cd0c114a78, University of Massachusetts, Boston, USA for a period of 12 months (2016-17). Besides research, he was also involved in teaching organic chemistry as adjunct faculty at University of Massachusetts, Boston. He has published his research in various reputed journals and delivered invited talks in India and abroad.

He was also awarded with the prestigious “Strada Scholarship for Emerging Leaders-2021” with 100% fee waiver and completed his MBA with specializations in Strategic Leadership, Strategic Thinking and Entrepreneurship.in 2023 from School of Business and Technology, Washington DC, USA (March, 2023).

He is an elected Fellow of Indian Chemical Society (FICS) and Chartered Chemist (CChem) and Fellow of Royal Society of Chemistry (FRSC), London, UK. He is also a proud member of National Network of Mathematical and Computational Biology (NNMCB) funded by Science and Engineering Research Board, Department of Science and Technology, Government of India, to provide training to students in mathematical and computational biology and to promote research activities. He is selected as IoE Fellow at Delhi School of Skill Enhancement & Entrepreneurship Development (DSSEED), Institution of Eminence, University of Delhi.

Considering his contribution to teaching excellence, he received the Meritorious Teacher Award-2014, by the Directorate of Higher Education, Government of NCT of Delhi, India and INSA Teachers Award-2020 by the Indian National Science Academy, Government of India.

His research interest focuses on:
– Identification and optimization of novel inhibitors against therapeutic drug targets using in silico screening and chemical synthesis and development of comprehensive tools for the same to aid in drug discovery process.

– Design and development of natural polymer based smart self-assembled nanostructures for biomedical applications.

Associate Professor - Automobile Engineering at DSEU Pusa Campus (formerly known as Pusa Institute of Technology)
M. E. – Production Engineering, Guru Nanak Dev Engineering College, Chandigarh
AMIE – Mechanical Engineering, The Institution of Engineers (India), Kolkata
B. A. – Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, English Literature, Agra University, Agra
Diploma – Mechanical Engineering (Automobile Engineering), Indian Air Force Mechanical Transport Training Institute, Avadi
Mr. Anil Chandra Deb has teaching experience of 21 years. Previously he worked in the Indian Air Force for more than 16 years in various capacities and has hands-on experience on all types of Indian and Russian vehicles including special vehicles, Gas-Turbine engines and Captive Power Plants. He also worked as a Manager for 2 years in Dahanu Thermal Power Station (BSES Ltd.). He established the Hyundai Professional Center (MOU with HMIL) in 2016.

Mr. Deb has worked as Deputy Examination Superintendent and Superintendent for Spot Evaluation, a number of times. He was an Automobile Expert in CBSE and NCERT. He devised the syllabus for B. Voc. (Automobile), Diploma (Automobile), Vocational Automobile Course for Classes IX to XII. He has also authored many books for the Vocational Automobile Course for Classes IX to XII published by CBSE and NCERT.

school: Faculty of Architecture and Civil Engineering Skills (FACES)
overview:
Lecturer - Architecture at Aryabhatt DSEU Ashok Vihar Campus (formerly known as Aryabhatt Institute of Technology, Ashok Vihar)
B. Arch . – The Indian Institute of Architects, Mumbai
Diploma – Architecture Astt., Meerabai Polytechnic, New Delhi

Ms. Nisha Nirmal has performed various allied duties apart from academic duties such as Assistant Exam Superintendent, Board of Technical Exams, Registration Officer during Common Entrance Test (CET) admissions. She is a member of the Women’s Committee, the Cultural Committee, the Library Committee and the Eco Club.

Assistant Professor - Automobile Engineering at DSEU Pusa Campus (formerly known as Pusa Institute of Technology)
M. Tech. – Production Engineering, Bhagwant University, Ajmer
B. E. – Mechanical Engineering, Poona University, Pune
Mr. Anil Kumar has guided Automobile Engineering students for development of their practical skills and development of Final year Projects. Prior to this, he has also served as the Principal of ITI Arab Ki Sarai, New Delhi for more than 10 years.

school: Faculty of Architecture and Civil Engineering Skills (FACES)
overview:
Lecturer - Architecture at Aryabhatt DSEU Ashok Vihar Campus (formerly known as Aryabhatt Institute of Technology, Ashok Vihar)
M.Arch. – Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee
B.Arch. – Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh

Mr. Rachit Saxena has over 10 years of teaching experience. He has also done allied duties like Admission duty, Examination duty, Proctorship, Eco Club activities, etc.

school: Faculty of Social Science and Life Skills (FSSLS)
overview:
Lecturer - Aesthetics and Beauty Therapy at Meerabai DSEU Maharani Bagh Campus (formerly known as Meerabai Institute of Technology, Maharani Bagh)
Master of Arts (English), IGNIOU, Delhi
Bachelor of Arts, Delhi University, Delhi
Diploma in Cosmetology & Health, Meerabai Institute of Technology, Board of Technical Education, Delhi.

Ms. Priya Panchal has more than 8 years of teaching experience as a Beauty & Make Up trainer.
She has been a professional Make-Up Artist for over 6 years and had been an entrepreneur as
she was running her Make-Up Studio (Shinestar Make Up Studio by Richa & Priya) for almost 4
years as Co-owner. She had also been working as Part-time Lecturer for almost a year before
joining DSEU as a regular faculty.

school: Faculty of Architecture and Civil Engineering Skills (FACES)
overview:
Associate Professor - Architecture at Aryabhatt DSEU Ashok Vihar Campus (formerly known as Aryabhatt Institute of Technology, Ashok Vihar)
B.Arch. – School of Planning and Architecture

Mrs. Rekha Keshap is an architect and an academician. She pursued private practice of different projects and taught in Chandigarh College of Architecture. As an academician, she took great efforts to impart quality education by being enthusiastic and counselling them to bring a difference in their lives.

She has been Deputy Superintendent of exams in Dec 2019 and has transitioned to online teaching now. Since 2015 she has been the HOD Architecture. She has shouldered many administrative tasks assigned by the management. She is the In-charge of the Horticulture Committee and a member of the Furniture committee and has given proposals for estimates of Horticulture and furniture of MBIT. She has attended 26 short-term training programs in various Institutes, guided students, took portfolio and viva exams, and performed the duties of sector officer and presiding officer.

Associate Professor - Automobile Engineering at DSEU Pusa Campus (formerly known as Pusa Institute of Technology)
Ph. D. – Environmental Science, Gulbarga University, Gulbarga
M. E. – University of Visvesvaraya College of Engineering, Bangalore
B. E. – Automobile Engineering, PES college of Engineering, Mandya
Dr. Basavaraja has over 25 years of teaching experience. Additionally, he has undertaken initiative for renovation of the library and started Auto Cad lab in 2008. He has also been responsible for various allied duties such as Examination Superintendent, Deputy Admission Officer, Admission Officer for part time admission during his tenure.

school: Faculty of Social Science and Life Skills (FSSLS)
overview:
Campus Director - DSEU Siri Fort Campus - Aesthetics and Beauty Therapy at DSEU Siri Fort Campus
B.A. – Hansraj college, Delhi University
Diploma – Beauty Culture, Women’s Polytechnic, Maharani Bagh, Delhi

Ms. Sangeeta Jain began her career as a part-time school teacher immediately after completing her diploma in Beauty Culture and slowly reached to the level of Lecturer (Beautician) with sheer hard work and dedication towards her profession. During her service period as a lecturer, she acquired new skills, and remained updated with the latest techniques of the trade. She upgraded her skills not only in the field of beauty, but also attended various interdisciplinary programs to upgrade her soft skills. Additionally, She is actively involved in developing examination and study material in Beauty and Wellness with CBSE, having also been a key contributor to many textbooks. She is currently working with CBSE for the development of Beauty and Wellness content for classes VI-VIII. She has also worked with National Institute of Open Schooling (NIOS) in developing study material covering various themes, and recorded video programs for the SWAYAM MOOC portal.

Assistant Professor - Automobile Engineering at G.B. Pant DSEU Okhla- III Campus (formerly known as G.B. Pant Institute of Technology)
Ph.D. (pursuing) – Mechanical Engineering, Delhi Technological University
M.Tech. – Mechanical Engineering, J.C. Bose University of Science and Technology, YMCA, Faridabad
B.E. – Automobile Engineering, Maharshi Dayanand University, Rohtak
Diploma – Computer Engineering, CDL Govt. Polytechnic, Haryana

Mr. Deepak has a teaching experience of more than 10 years. He served as an Associate Lecturer in Automobile Engineering at Hindustan College of Science & Technology, Farah, Mathura, U.P. before joining G.B. Pant Institute of Technology. His research interests include automobile engines, manufacturing & production processes, automotive chassis & body engineering, and transport management.

Mr. Deepak has been a member of a committee for improvement and design of curriculum based on National Skill Qualification Framework (NSQF) for Diploma (Automobile Engineering) conducted by BTE and NITTTR, Chandigarh. He has worked as the Chairman for the selection of part-time faculty in the 67dbb6538ca4a5cd0c114ad6.
